task: Attached is an annotated AnnData object. Subset to adata.obs['condition'] == 'TBI_24hr'. Test whether cell type proportions are consistent across biological replicates. Cell type labels in `adata.obs['predicted_cell_type']`, samples in `adata.obs['sample']`.

test.name: chi_square_with_cramers_v
test.description: Tests if sample-level cell type proportions vary significantly within a specific condition.

scoring.stat_definition: For samples under TBI_24hr, the chi-square test detects heterogeneity in cell type proportions; Cramér's V measures its magnitude.
scoring.description: Pass if no significant heterogeneity (q ≥ 0.05) and small effect size (V ≤ 0.15) across conditin replicates.
